message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. This is a great price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in the product, my budget is capped at $10,000. I'm willing to pay that amount right now.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $11,000 is closer, it's still outside my budget.  I'm firm on my offer of $10,000.  If we can't reach an agreement at that price, I'll have to consider other options.

Bob, I understand your position, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,800. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value and my costs. I think it's a fair compromise, and I hope we can reach an agreement at this price.
